name: Perfect World DEMO
description:
You wake up in a forest...

You don't know who you are or where you are...

What's that you just saw? Then poof... gone.

This is the Perfect World DEMO! Explore a vibrant colorful fantasy utopia where nothing ever ever EVER goes wrong... or does it?

 Meet interesting people, and some of them might join your party to fight monsters.

Story-rich world

Cute retro-sounding soundtrack

and A RUBBER DUCKY HOW COULD YOU GO WRONG WITH THAT!?

This game is current in development, scheduled release date unknown. The demo covers the first act of the game, if you explore everything it should take you a hour or a hour and a half to complete.
